mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.gongzuorenyuan_id as gongzuorenyuanId ,a.tousu_uuid_number as tousuUuidNumber ,a.tousu_name as tousuName ,a.tousu_types as tousuTypes ,a.tousu_content as tousuContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.chuli_types as chuliTypes ,a.chuli_text as chuliText ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.new_money as newMoney ,gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_uuid_number as gongzuorenyuanUuidNumber ,gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_name as gongzuorenyuanName ,gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_phone as gongzuorenyuanPhone ,gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_id_number as gongzuorenyuanIdNumber ,gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_photo as gongzuorenyuanPhoto ,gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_email as gongzuorenyuanEmail
FROM tousu a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id left JOIN gongzuorenyuan gongzuorenyuan ON a.gongzuorenyuan_id = gongzuorenyuan.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and ( a.gongzuorenyuan_id = #{params.gongzuorenyuanId} )
and a.tousu_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.tousuUuidNumber},'%')
and a.tousu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.tousuName},'%')
and a.tousu_types = #{params.tousuTypes}
and a.tousu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.tousuContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.chuli_types = #{params.chuliTypes}
and a.chuli_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.chuliText},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.new_money >= #{params.newMoneyStart}
and yonghu.new_money <= #{params.newMoneyEnd}
and a.gongzuorenyuan_id IS NOT NULL
and gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongzuorenyuanUuidNumber},'%')
and gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongzuorenyuanName},'%')
and gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongzuorenyuanPhone},'%')
and gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongzuorenyuanIdNumber},'%')
and gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongzuorenyuanEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
